name.description: The app name for the Spark History Server.  The service will be available at http://<dcos_url>/service/<name>/

log-dir.description: Base directory to look for spark events.  Usually a networked directory like HDFS.  Note that this directory must exist prior to installing this package.

docker-image.description: Docker image to run in.  See https://hub.docker.com/r/mesosphere/spark/tags/ for options.

hdfs-config-url.description: URL which serves hdfs-site.xml and core-site.xml (i.e. <hdfs-config-url>/hdfs-site.xml should exist)

enabled.description: Specifies whether the Spark History Server should periodically clean up event logs from storage.

interval.description: Frequency the Spark History Server checks for files to delete.

max-age.description: History files older than this will be deleted.
